function.name: s3Storage
function.description: Adds a Amazon S3 Artifact Storage project feature @see S3Storage

param.name: storage.s3.upload.presignedUrl.enabled
param.description: Whether to use Pre-Signed URLs to upload

param.name: storage.s3.forceVirtualHostAddressing
param.description: Whether to force Virtual Host Addressing

param.name: storage.s3.upload.multipart_threshold
param.description: Initiates multipart upload for files larger than the specified value. Minimum value is 5MB. Allowed suffixes: KB, MB, GB, TB. Leave empty to use the default value.

param.name: storage.s3.upload.multipart_chunksize
param.description: Specify the maximum allowed part size. Minimum value is 5MB. Allowed suffixes: KB, MB, GB, TB. Leave empty to use the default value.

param.name: storage.s3.cloudfront.enabled
param.description: Whether to use CloudFront for artifact downloads

param.name: storage.s3.cloudfront.publicKeyId
param.description: Id of Public Key in CloudFront that has access to selected distribution

param.name: teamcitySshKey
param.description: Id of private SSH Key that corresponds to chosen public key
